text: Thanks for the likes! FYI: I’m half Norwegian so my team says it’s 90% Genetic but if Sunburned as a kid a few times, I played a lot of Tennis (No Blocks then) did have a lower GI tumor removed 3 yrs ago. 1st treatment Yervoy,then Opdivo,NEW IMMUNOS. Neurotin/Booze & sick. Karma

text: I couldn’t walk w/o gabapentin aka neurotin. But can’t tolerate Lyrica even though they are almost the same med. My mom is the same way as far as tolerating them. I don’t like the side effects of gabapentin but require it even w/pain meds due to extensive nerve damage. 😕

text: Gabapentin aka neurotin is the ONLY thing that allows me to still walk. Yes..I LOATHE the side effects & yes..I’ve decreased my dosage using supplements as much as possible. Yet I DO need it even WITH proper pain meds. BUT I DO recognize how bad it affects some.
